document.full_text: never before has a eurovision song contest winner claimed back-to-back titles but a perky german teen who gave her long-suffering nation cause to celebrate a year ago is on a risky mission to repeat.
document.title: germany's lena wants 2nd eurovision song contest win
lines_and_colors: never before has a eurovision song contest winner claimed back-to-back titles but a perky german teen who gave her long-suffering nation cause to celebrate a year ago is on a risky mission to repeat.
